replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
Enug魔兽 发表于 2020-3-9 20:11
两个，我不小心摁了下回车..
用压缩软件打开 ess ，编辑其中的 messages.properties

找到 backAfterDeath=\u00a76Use the\u00a7c /back\u00a76 command to return to your death point.

修改

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
spigot.yml 中修改

  unknown-command: Unknown command. Type "/help" for help.

replies.author: 思念化作海
replies.txt_content:
Enug魔兽 发表于 2020-3-9 20:11
两个，我不小心摁了下回车..
第二个 用压缩包打开essentials的jar 打开message.properties 搜索backAfterDeath 修改成你想要的就可以了
